mapper.select: select jg."name" as groupname from jhta01_schedule js inner join jhta01_group jg on js.group_id = jg.id where js.id = #{id}

select js.id, js.group_id as groupID, jg."name" as groupname, js.editor,js.title, js."content",js.start_date as startDate, js.end_date as endDate from jhta01_schedule js left join jhta01_group jg on js.group_id = jg.id where js.group_id in (select group_id from jhta01_follow where username = #{username}) or (js.group_id isnull and js.editor = #{username})
mapper.update: update jhta01_schedule set title = #{title}, "content" = #{content}, start_date = #{startDate}, end_date = #{endDate}, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select editor from jhta01_schedule js where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into jhta01_schedule values( nextval('SCHEDULE_SEQ'), null, #{editor}, #{title}, #{content}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )
insert into jhta01_schedule values( nextval('SCHEDULE_SEQ'), #{groupID}, #{editor}, #{title}, #{content}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )
mapper.delete: delete from jhta01_schedule where id = #{id} and editor = #{editor}
